  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3339</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Using Ning in a University EFL Classroom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verwenden von von Ning in einem Universitäts-EFL
Klassenzimmer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Utilisation de Ning dans une salle de classe de 
l'université EFL</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usando Ning em uma sala de aula da universidade 
EFL</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usando Ning in un'aula dell'università EFL</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποίηση Ning σε μια πανεπιστημιακή τάξη EFL</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Usar Ning en una sala de clase de la universidad 
EFL</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This article,which appears in the ETNI magazine RAG,discusses how to engage and motivate EFL/ESL learners in projects and in collaborating worldwide by means of a social network called "ning".</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">University</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">EFL classroom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">web 2.0</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Artikel, der im ETNI Zeitschrift Lappen 
erscheint, behandelt, wie man EFL/ESL Anfänger in den Projekten 
engagiert und motiviert und in weltweit zusammenarbeiten mittels eines
Sozialnetzes, das "Ning" genannt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet article, qui paraît dans le chiffon de 
magazine d'ETNI, discute comment engager et motiver des étudiants 
d'EFL/ESL dans les projets et en collaborant dans le monde entier au 
moyen d'un réseau social appelé "ning".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este artigo, que se publica no pano do 
compartimento de ETNI, discute como acoplar e motivate learners de 
EFL/ESL nos projetos e em collaborating worldwide por meio de uma rede
social chamada "ning".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo articolo, che è publicato nel panno dello
scomparto di ETNI, discute come agganciare e motivare i principianti 
di EFL/ESL nei progetti e nella collaborazione universalmente per 
mezzo di una rete sociale chiamata "ning".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το άρθρο, που εμφανίζεται στο ΚΟΥΡΈΛΙ περιοδικών
ETNI, συζητά πώς να συμμετέχει και τους αρχαρίους να 
παρακινήσει EFL/toy ESL στα προγράμματα και να συνεργαστεί 
παγκοσμίως με τη βοήθεια ενός κοινωνικού δικτύου αποκαλούμενου 
"ning".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este artículo, que aparece en el trapo del 
compartimiento de ETNI, discute cómo contratar y motivar a 
principiantes de EFL/ESL en proyectos y en la colaboración por todo 
el mundo por medio de una red social llamada el "ning".</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Universität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">EFL Klassenzimmer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Web 2.0</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Université</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Salle de classe d'EFL</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Web 2.0</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Universidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sala de aula de EFL</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Web 2.0</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Università</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aula di EFL</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Web 2.0</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πανεπιστήμιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τάξη EFL</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιστός 2,0</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sala de clase de EFL</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Web 2.0</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
